content: round 3 times 2 make decreases in every 2nd round till approx 12sts left in every part or approx 48sts in total 3 make decreases in every round till 10- 12sts left in total break off your yarn to leave a 15cm tail and thread through your remaining sts with a blunt yarn needle pull the yarn tail to draw your stitches together your beanie is ready wash and block it carefully according to recommendations for your yarn 3 @floralwool for personal use only
